Aelo/Perceptor/Ocipite::


"I'm arriving" said Aelo. when she arrived she shot (with the 
shuttle) against Putnam's. (25 shot)

"Hey!!" said the femme by comm link "I could need somehelp here..."

Aelo moved his shuttle towards Greven.

*********************

Darkfate looked to Perceptor and Aelo, they left the room where they 
were. Soon each bot took a shuttle and left the base.

- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Greven and Demise arn't like right next to each other.
> 
> ::Greven/Scyther::
> 
> Greven reacts fast, flying almost completely out of the way of the 
> blast, but losing a leg in the proccess. So much for the agreement 
> Killfest had had with these bots. He activates a transmission to 
the 
> other Predacon shuttles.
> 
> "I'd appreciate it if you guys hurried up and got me and Demise out 
> of here," he says into his comm, moving to make himself a harder 
> target.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> "Slag!" Scyther exclaims when he sees weaponfire in the distance. 
He 
> looks at Pinsir. "Stay here. I'll go take care of this."
> 
> He closes the shuttle door and takes off toward the Energonian 
ship, 
> firing his shuttle's turrets at it.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., JP3884@a... wrote:
> >        Putnam gave a brief chuckle at Grevens response. They 
werent 
> going to 
> > assist them back to planetside, they were going to assist them 
into 
> the 
> > Inferno.
> >        "Fire the Tripulse at them. It should be enough to get rid 
> of them. 
> > And scan the area for the other Predacon vessles, keep weapons 
> armed." 
> > Ominous commanded. 
> >        He then watched as a large blue blast exited the Tripulse 
> canon. It 
> > soarded towrds Greven and Demise.
